title: Registration open for K’exej, a project to strengthen translation into Yucatec Maya
content: Want more news translated to Yucatec Maya? Want to join a community of practice? Rising Voices and Lingua invite you to apply!
creator: Eddie Avila
sourceDescription: Helping the global population join the global conversation

title: Wikimedia Community Ireland and Rising Voices collaborate for a Gaeilge language digital activism workshop at the National Library of Ireland
content: Rising Voices teamed up with Wikimedia Ireland Community for a one-day workshop to create a roadmap for the Irish language online.
creator: Eddie Avila
sourceDescription: Helping the global population join the global conversation

title: Indigenous digital activists in Mexico assert their self-determination with regard to artificial intelligence
content: What does artificial intelligence mean for Mexico's Indigenous languages? For two days, digital activists reflected on how these technologies can revitalize or threaten their languages and cultures.
creator: Rising Voices
sourceDescription: Helping the global population join the global conversation

title: Two alphabets, one struggle: How Kurdish communities are building a digital future
content: Kurdish Wikimedian Mohammed Sardar shares why he creates digital content to preserve his native language.
creator: Eddie Avila
sourceDescription: Helping the global population join the global conversation

title: A living archive: 42 Indigenous languages in Bangladesh preserved under one online portal
content: A new digital repository preserves Bangladesh’s linguistic heritage, featuring words, phrases, and IPA transcriptions from 42 indigenous languages, aiming to promote understanding and celebrate the nation’s cultural diversity.
creator: Eddie Avila
sourceDescription: Helping the global population join the global conversation

title: Workshop report: Design your road map for Angika Language digital activism in Bihar, India
content: Twenty-two Angika speakers and five language guardians joined a workshop in Bhagalpur, Bihar, India from April 28–29, 2025, to explore digital strategies for enhancing Angika’s online presence, organized by Rising Voices and Angika Wikimedians.
creator: Eddie Avila
sourceDescription: Helping the global population join the global conversation

title: Join us: Online meeting to highlight digital initiatives for Adivasi languages of India
content: Join Rising Voices, Wikimedians of Santali Language User Group, Open Knowledge Initiatives, Adivasi Lives Matter, Boli Cheto, and OpenSpeaks for an Online Meeting: Digital Initiatives for Adivasi and Low-Resource Languages of India that will take place online on Sunday, June 29, 2025.
creator: Rising Voices
sourceDescription: Helping the global population join the global conversation

title: Join us: Online meeting to highlight Indonesian Indigenous language digital activism
content: Join Rising Voices and Wikimedia Indonesia for an Online Meeting: Digital Initiatives for Indigenous Languages of Indonesia on June 28, 2025
creator: Rising Voices
sourceDescription: Helping the global population join the global conversation

title: Join Us for the Edit-a-thon: Strengthening Wikipedia Malagasy with Global Voices
content: Wikimedia Community User Group Madagascar and Global Voices Malagasy invite you to take part in the one-day edit-a-thon designed to create free knowledge in Malagasy incorporating citable sources from Global Voices in Malagasy.
creator: Andriamifidisoa Zo
sourceDescription: Helping the global population join the global conversation

title: [Call for Participants] Workshop: Build Your Own Road Map for Javanese Language Digital Activism in Yogyakarta, Indonesia
content: You are invited to the workshop “Build your own road map for Javanese language digital activism”, taking place on May 24-25, 2025, in Yogakarta, Indonesia, organized the Wikimedian Community of Yogyakarta in collaboration with Rising Voices.
creator: Adien Gunarta
sourceDescription: Helping the global population join the global conversation
